title: How do I check the available space in the internal storage and microSD card?
answer:
Go to Settings and touch Storage. Under INTERNAL STORAGE, you can check the total and available space in the internal storage. Under SD CARD, you can check the total and available space in your microSD card.   
 Your phone comes with an internal storage media whose storage capacity depends on the chip product specifications while the storage capacity of the SD card depends the SD card your phone uses.
